reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything was in order and clean when we arrived. Moreover, our room was cleaned almost daily. The local lady is also nice and helpful.
reviews.title: Decent for what you pay

reviews.text: On the negative side, rooms are not soundproof at all, and if you are unlucky (as we were during one night) you hear everything of what's going on in the neighboring rooms. Considering that the beds are also uncomfortable, the quality of sleep we had there was quite poor.
reviews.title: a quiet retreat
Superb Holiday, Graham and Anne, Batley
reviews.text: Wi-Fi in common areas (which basically means at the reception) is slow and it often stops working until they manually reset it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hi everyone, I actually live on the island in a lovely village called La Oliva. But prior to moving out here in 2006 we spent many holidays at Castillo Playa. The apartments are basic but well maintained and clean. The staff are friendly. It is an ideal haven for a relaxing holiday just a stone throw from the bars and restaurants. Even though we now live here we still book a week in July when our daughter finishes school and we love it. Basic but good is an honest description. Enjoy!
reviews.title: Excellent and affordable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautiful bungalows in nice location. Quiet on a night for sleeping but 2 minute walk to start of bars and restaurants and beach. Aircraft flying over during the day but so what, no night flights waking you. All the staff, from the complex director down to the cleaners (and I do not mean this to sound patronising) are absolutely top notch, particularly a crazy Scottish lady who runs the poolside bar during the day, Izzy, heart of gold, good fun and good cook. Only reservations we had were the lack of sports TV in the bar but I was told this would be addressed very soon, and the lack of comfortable sun loungers around the pool but I am sure they will sort out these issues. We will definitely be returning.
reviews.title: I'm not known for this kind of accomodation but......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we stayed here for two weeks last week in august first week in september its our third stay at the bungalows and we cant fault them there is a new poolside bar izzy who runs it is a great cook and a really nice lady nothing is too much bother try the train ride around the mountian theres loads of bars near by the windmill at the end of the road is good to watch sports great bar staff sarah makes you feel welcome the slowboat 2 chineese next to villa florida is the best curry ever pieros music bars are great loads of live music theres a great beach loads to do were back in february for two weeks cant wait
reviews.title: another great holliday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Whilst this is our first review of the bungalows; this was actually our 3rd visit.
reviews.title: A Hidden Treasure

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If what you’re after is a chilled, relaxing and welcoming break, in our opinion, we don’t think you could ask for more. The bungalows are something of a niche design, offering privacy when needed, yet with an open, patio area for that neighbourly feel.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: We've met a lot of new people and lovely friends throughout our stays, many of which are also repeat visitors to the bungalows, which for us, speak volumes of the appeal.
reviews.title: An excellent find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We find the pool bar especially welcoming and the food very good, and well presented (a big thanks to you Issy, for all those lovely breakfasts). The pool itself, whilst maybe slightly cool for some, we found very refreshing, and always clean & well maintained.
reviews.title: lovely place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great time here, nearly everyone me met were repeat guest which says a lot about the place. You can tell the owners really care about ensuring their guests have a great time. The mattresses are all new and are some of the comfiest I've ever slept on plus all the kitchen appliances appeared to be new. The TV has HDMI and USB connectivity which will be handy if you are travelling with gadgets. The layout of the complex is great with your own patio with sunbeds if you want privacy but also there is a communal sun terrace around the pool. The pool bar is a great place for a social drink or something to eat made even better during the 2 happy hours! €1.50 a pint. As many have said Izzy who runs the bar is an absolute star, a real credit to the place and cooks a great full English. She even went to the trouble of finding me a candle to put in my wife's hash brown on her birthday :) its close to many of Caleta's bars and restaurants, if you know the place than the Windmill I'd the closest place, very handy for all the footie:)
reviews.title: Wonderful holiday - we will return!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are already thinking about booking for next Christmas, lets hope we can get in!!!
reviews.title: Great location, clean and great value for money

reviews.text: We have just returned from a ten day stay at Castillo Playa where we had a very enjoyable and relaxing stay.
reviews.title: happy times

reviews.text: Very helpful staff from reception to the cleaners - We asked for a room in row 300 and was given what we wanted - sun from noon until five-ish - perfect for late risers.
reviews.title: great value.

reviews.text: The bungalow was perfect for our needs, clean, well presented and comfortable.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: basic but clean and got everything you need. Good location, great value for money. Very quiet so ideal for a relaxing break, not much there for kids as no kids club, but that's better for people who don't have children, there are other hotels more suitable for children. This is more suitable for adults. The beds are a bit hard and the pool is cold (as is usual in Spain in winter), but we have stayed here before, and would stay again. We have recommended it to other people and they agree and are also going back. The bungalows are made to be quite private. The bungalows are on the flight path to the airport, so planes are low, but you get used to it, and its actually quite interesting! The flights stop after a Certain time at night and start arriving about 8am. Great for the beach and the shopping complex and restaurants. 10 mins from the airport, so you can get a taxi (or the bus ). Overall, it's perfect. Tip: there is a chicken barbecue shop near the dulche de leche bakery (can be seen from main road), its handy for self Catering!
reviews.title: perfect - hidden gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for a week in November 2013. Overall a great stay - location was great, beach and shops / restaurants just around the corner. Would've been nice to have the padded base on the sun loungers without having to ask for them daily (didn't bothering as only used them briefly most days). No hairdryers but otherwise bungalows have all that is required. Had a pool view room as requested but not afternoon sun, tried a few times but pool just too cold to go fully in :-)
reviews.title: Basic, but clean and great value.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Took the public bus (5 min walk from the bungalows - beside the Saturday market) to / from airport for just €1.40 each way. (Turn right just before the 'Windmill' pub for the Bungalows).
reviews.title: another great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Large Spar Supermarket (15 min walk) in the nearby commercial centre.
reviews.title: One word. Fantastic.

reviews.text: just back from a two week stay at castillo playa, on arrival at reception we asked for two sun mattresses [free] a tv remote 10 euro deposit and a parasol 2 euro. We stayed in 106 a corner apartment which had a double bed, the rooms were kept clean and tidy and the towels changed every day.
reviews.title: Brilliant Holiday, will definitely go back!
